name: Bastiodon
flavorText: Any frontal attack is repulsed. It is a docile Pokemon that feeds on grass and berries.
Ability1Text: Prevent all damage done to your Benched Pokemon by your opponent's attacks.
Attack1Text: If Bastiodon was damaged by an attack during your opponent's last turn, this attack does 40 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Lucario
flavorText: It has the ability to sense the auras of all things. It understands human speech.
Attack1Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.
Attack2Text: Does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Manaphy
flavorText: Born on a cold seafloor, it will swim great distances to return to its birthplace.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokemon and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Switch Manaphy with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Pachirisu
flavorText: It makes fur balls that crackle with static electricity. It stores them with berries in tree holes.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a basic Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, Pachirisu does 10 damage to itself.

name: Rampardos
flavorText: Its powerful head butt has enough power to shatter even the most durable things upon impact.
Attack1Text: As long as the Defending Pokemon's remaining HP is 60 or less, this attack's base damage is 60 instead of 30.
Attack2Text: Rampardos does 20 damage to itself. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poke-Powers, Poke-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokemon.

name: Drifloon
flavorText: A Pokemon formed by the spirits of people and Pokemon. It loves damp, humid seasons.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, put 1 of your Benched Pokemon and all cards attached to it on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused and can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

name: Gible
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Riolu
flavorText: The aura that emanates from its body intensifies to alert others if it is afraid or sad.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Pikachu
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage to 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Staravia
flavorText: It flies around forests and fields in search of bug Pokemon. It stays within a huge flock.
Attack1Text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

name: Bidoof
flavorText: With nerves of steel, nothing can perturb it. It is more agile and active than it appears.
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of the Defending Pokemon's attacks. That Pokemon can't use that attack during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Search your discard pile for a Trainer card, show it to your opponent, an put it into your hand.

name: Buneary
flavorText: It slams foes by sharply uncoiling is rolled ears. It stings enough to make a grown-up cry in pain.
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Cherubi
flavorText: The small ball holds the nutrients needed for evolution. Apparently, it is very sweet and tasty.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: If this attack does any damage to the Defending Pokemon (after applying Weakness and Resistance), remove 1 damage counter from Cherubi.

name: Chimchar
flavorText: It agilely scales cliffs to live atop craggy mountains. Its fire is put out when it sleeps.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads discard a Fire Energy attached to Chimchar.

name: Piplup
flavorText: Because it is very proud, it hates accepting food from people. Its thick down guards it from cold.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage.

name: Starly
flavorText: They flock in great numbers. Though small, they flap their wings with great power.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Turtwig
flavorText: Made from soil, the shell on its back hardens when it drinks water. It lives along lakes.
